definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: I think you get the picture.
sentences.chinese: 我想你能想象到这个画面。

sentences.english: In the past seven years, we've also seen images that have sobered us.
sentences.chinese: 在过去七年时间里，我们也看到令人警醒的画面。

sentences.english: It's my Daddy, the actor, about to die with his boots on.
sentences.chinese: 那是我爸爸，那个演员，即将横死的画面。

sentences.english: Let go hand in a noisy streets, find the pupil picture www. anhuiqq. cn.
sentences.chinese: 放开手在喧闹的大街，找不到瞳孔中的画面。

sentences.english: The police officer said to Linda, " I think my dog found your dog." [15:50.13]4a Use these pictures to write a story.
sentences.chinese: 把这些画面写成一个故事。

sentences.english: The images of women barefoot on the street, handcuffed and tied to a rope, enraged internet users.
sentences.chinese: 被绳子绑住的妇女赤脚走在街上的画面激怒了网民。

sentences.english: How can you deal with these disturbing stories and images?
sentences.chinese: 你如何处理这些令人不安的故事和画面呢？

sentences.english: I use the strong contrast of the color to romance the picture and extrude the subject.
sentences.chinese: 以反差强烈的色彩渲染画面，突出主题。

sentences.english: The artist sketched in a few trees to show a vividness in its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 画家粗略地添加了几棵树，使画面环境颇显生动。

sentences.english: The portrait, painted in a simple but elegant style, has a romantic flavor.
sentences.chinese: 画面墨淡气雅，设色颇有浪漫主义韵味。

sentences.english: Most of the images are taken with micro techniques and lens to be able to shot these great shots.
sentences.chinese: 大多数技术和镜头都能够拍摄这些精彩画面。

sentences.english: Indigo glazing through the last crystal glazed processing screen.
sentences.chinese: 通过靛蓝上釉，最后水晶釉面处理画面。

sentences.english: Many customers complained about the size of the old model's screen.
sentences.chinese: 很多顾客抱怨相关旧机种画面的尺寸太小。

sentences.english: If the screen turned the last two tiles match, the player receives points.
sentences.chinese: 如果画面上最后两项翻砖相匹配，该播放器接收点。

sentences.english: So I give you a scene from The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我先给大家一个来自“电脑穿网球鞋“中的画面。

definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
